sessions.title: AI for better health
sessions.description: AI is accelerating life-saving breakthroughs, transforming healthcare experiences, and enabling global health equity. This session will feature customers and partners discussing real-world examples of AI innovation, the integration of responsible AI practices, and its impact on clinicians, patients, and researchers. Participate in shaping a future for every person on the planet to live healthier.

sessions.title: Connect the future with AI
sessions.description: Telecoms are leading the charge to transform with AI. Discover how telecoms are adopting Copilot and Agentic AI to personalize service, automate network and business operations, and grow revenues to thrive in today’s rapidly evolving market.

sessions.title: Industrial AI in action
sessions.description: Industrial companies across every sector have an opportunity to reimagine their operations, blending human expertise with AI capabilities. In this new frontier, Industrial AI collaboration and orchestration amplify worker productivity, product quality, and facility adaptability. This shift allows every organization to address immediate challenges while bending the curve on innovation.

sessions.title: Power of Possible: AI in Education
sessions.description: In an AI-driven world, access to quality education is more critical than ever. With the most purpose-built and transformative AI tools and services of our time, Microsoft is meeting this moment by putting people first—shaping a future where every student, educator, and institution can unlock the power of possible for AI in education.

sessions.title: Unlock AI innovation and agility in Retail and Consumer Goods
sessions.description: To grow and thrive in a rapidly changing world, Frontier retailers and consumer goods brands worldwide are looking to supercharge innovation while optimizing their businesses for resilience and agility. Learn how Microsoft generative and agentic AI solutions are helping retailers and consumer goods companies grow revenue, reimagine shopper engagement, empower workers, build agile supply chains, and deliver products people love.

sessions.title: Security Copilot: Your GenAI-powered path to better security
sessions.description: Learn how Security Copilot is transforming security and IT by automating tasks, surfacing insights, and empowering teams to respond faster and smarter.

sessions.title: Becoming Frontier
sessions.description: Microsoft leaders share a framework for success to become frontier companies through AI Transformation and human ambition.

sessions.title: Industrial AI in action
sessions.description: Industrial companies across every sector have an opportunity to reimagine their operations, blending human expertise with AI capabilities. In this new frontier, Industrial AI collaboration and orchestration amplify worker productivity, product quality, and facility adaptability. This shift allows every organization to address immediate challenges while bending the curve on innovation.

sessions.title: Becoming a Frontier Firm with Copilot + Agents
sessions.description: AI is transforming how work gets done. Frontier Firms are organizations who embed AI into every facet of their business. Join us to understand how to become a Frontier Firm and build an AI-powered enterprise with Microsoft 365 Copilot and agents.

sessions.title: GitHub Copilot as an AI Agent in the Developer Workflow
sessions.description: See how GitHub Copilot exhibits agent-like behavior in real dev workflows, planning, executing multi-step tasks, and integrating deeply into engineering processes. Go beyond autocomplete with practical examples from real-world use.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Securing AI Applications on Azure
sessions.description: Securely deploy AI apps on Azure with keyless Azure AI access, Entra-based user authentication, and safety via content filters/jailbreak detection.

sessions.title: Frontier Firm: Turning ambition into adoption with an AI-ready workforce
sessions.description: Explore how Frontier Firms are unlocking business value from AI by integrating ongoing skill development into their organizational culture. Join us to gain perspectives from Microsoft and select customers on their strategies for implementing company-wide AI learning aligned with business objectives.

sessions.title: Explore AI-assisted learning experiences from Microsoft Learn
sessions.description: Microsoft Learn uses AI to help you build your skills with features that adapt to your learning needs and preferences. Explore features like personalized assistance with Ask Learn, create learning plans tailored to your specific needs, and improve your focus with AI-powered assessments.

sessions.title: Advanced agent development with Copilot Studio
sessions.description: Autonomous agents are transforming work. With Copilot Studio, teams can build decision-making agents using low-code tools, triggers, and orchestration—plus new features like agent flows, multi-agent coordination, and built-in governance.
sessions.topic: Innovate with low code AI and agents

sessions.title: Copilot Ready: Strategy, Data, and Security
sessions.description: Unlock Copilot’s full potential by preparing your org with data readiness, tenant hygiene, and agent security. Learn to secure environments, reduce data sprawl, prevent Shadow AI leaks, and scale Copilot deployment with built-in tools. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***

sessions.title: Driving business innovation with AI apps and agents
sessions.description: Discover how AI apps and agents are redefining customer engagement, reshaping business processes, driving employee satisfaction, and helping businesses rapidly accelerate innovation. See real-world examples and learn how Microsoft Azure empowers you to build secure, scalable AI solutions.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Real world code migration with GitHub Copilot Agent Mode
sessions.description: Learn how GitHub Copilot Agent Mode can speed up the migration of a Python HTTP API to Rust. From syntax conversion to endpoint testing, you'll see how the agent helps break down and automate tasks throughout the entire refactor process. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Unlock your agents’ potential with Model Context Protocol (MCP)
sessions.description: Learn how to build a conversational AI agent in Python using Azure AI Foundry, Model Context Protocol (MCP), and PostgreSQL. You'll enable data querying, time services, code generation for sales insights, and visual search for product discovery. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: What's new in Microsoft databases: empowering AI-driven app dev
sessions.description: Learn how to support AI agents with secure, scalable, and resilient data backends. See how SQL Server, Azure SQL, and Cosmos DB enable smart scaling, built-in security, and high availability in real-world autonomous AI architectures.

sessions.title: Turning AI Potential into High-Impact AI Business Cases and ROI
sessions.description: Discover Microsoft’s high-impact AI Value Framework to build outcome-driven business cases. Drive ROI via time savings, error reduction, throughput, revenue growth, and cost avoidance—with clear next steps for customers and partners.

sessions.title: Scaling AI with Purpose: A Human-Centered Approach
sessions.description: Learn how frontier firms can adopt AI with purpose and empathy. This session introduces tools and frameworks to identify user scenarios, validate solutions, embed feedback, align leadership, and drive change through a human-centered lens.

sessions.title: Advanced retrieval for your AI Apps and Agents on Azure
sessions.description: Learn how to build production-ready AI agents using Azure AI Search and PostgreSQL. This session covers agentic retrieval, graph-based retrieval, and advanced grounding techniques to power your enterprise AI apps.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Enable agentic AI apps with a unified data estate in Microsoft Fabric
sessions.description: Explore how organizations can enable agentic AI applications by unifying their data estate using Microsoft Fabric. Through the story of Zava, a regional DIY retailer, the session demonstrates how fragmented data systems can be modernized, integrated, and made AI-ready. Attendees will see practical demos covering data unification, transformation, governance, CI/CD for data products, and the integration of AI-powered experiences, all while maintaining robust security and compliance.

sessions.title: End-to-end security in the age of agentic AI
sessions.description: Discover why security should be your top priority in your AI transformation. Learn how a modernized SOC can streamline your defenses, save you time and money, and build trust. Gain insight into how agentic AI helps proactively defend against threats, secure data, and support safe AI adoption.

sessions.title: Unify and activate your data for AI innovation
sessions.description: Modernize your data and analytics estate for the AI era. Learn how to unify, transform, and govern your data to unlock AI-driven insights and smarter decisions. We’ll cover Microsoft Fabric and Azure Databricks, data solutions built to meet you where you are, with proven impact on customer success.

sessions.title: Copilot Control System: Secure, Manage, and Measure AI
sessions.description: Explore how the Copilot Control System (CCS) equips IT and security leaders with a system of integrated controls to secure and govern sensitive data, manage access and usage, and measure adoption and impact of Microsoft 365 Copilot and agents.

sessions.title: Building agentic solutions with Copilot Studio
sessions.description: Dive into Copilot Studio and build a full agent from the ground up. In this hands-on session, you’ll design, automate, and deploy using tools like Agent Flows and MCP, you'll gain practical skills to create powerful, real-world agents that scale with your business. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***
sessions.topic: Innovate with low code AI and agents

sessions.title: Improving Ops with Copilot in Azure and GitHub Copilot
sessions.description: Learn how Copilot in Azure boosts app resilience by reviewing logs and streamlining ops. Get hands-on with real scenarios, and see how GitHub Copilot can enhance your build and deployment workflows. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***

sessions.title: Modernize your data estate with Fabric, Databricks, and AI Foundry
sessions.description: Learn how to create AI-driven experiences that feel agentic using Microsoft Fabric and Azure Databricks. This hands-on lab covers real-time data ingestion, transformation, and serving models that drive interactive, intelligent apps. ***Note: You must bring your own laptop with a keyboard to participate in this workshop.***

sessions.title: Accelerate AI transformation at scale on Azure
sessions.description: Many organizations struggle to scale AI due to legacy platforms. Discover how migrating and modernizing with Azure accelerates AI innovation, cuts costs, boosts agility, and strengthens security—featuring proven strategies and real success stories.

sessions.title: Build and launch AI agents fast with GitHub Models and Azure AI Foundry
sessions.description: Build and ship AI agents faster with GitHub Models and Azure. Prototype with open models, scale with Azure AI Foundry Models, and streamline workflows with the AI Toolkit in VS Code. Experiment with models and prompts, evaluate agent responses, then move from prototype to cloud with developer tools.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Building enterprise-ready AI Agents with Azure AI Foundry
sessions.description: Learn how to build, deploy and manage AI agents using Azure AI Foundry Agent Service and the latest SDKs. This session walks through real-world agent workflows, multi-agents orchestration, interoperability with open protocols and best practices to make your agents ready for production.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Deploy and manage agents securely at scale with the Copilot Control System
sessions.description: Admins, take control with Copilot Control System. Learn to scale and manage agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio—securely and efficiently. Gain insights into MAC, PPAC, usage metrics, and cost management.

sessions.title: Fast track business impact with AI agents in Copilot Studio
sessions.description: The AI-first era is here. Learn how Copilot Studio and Power Platform help you build agents that automate workflows, adapt in real time, and scale. All while maintaining control with enterprise-grade governance.
sessions.topic: Innovate with low code AI and agents

sessions.title: Accelerate your AI transformation with Surface Copilot+ PCs
sessions.description: Make your AI strategy real with Surface Copilot+ PCs. Explore on-device AI, hybrid inferencing, and security that drive efficiency, innovation, and measurable business impact.

sessions.title: Windows – The secure AI platform for work
sessions.description: Explore how Windows powers secure, AI-driven productivity—from Copilot+ PCs to Windows 365 for agents—built for scalable, resilient, and intelligent work.

sessions.title: Agentic use of GitHub Copilot within Visual Studio
sessions.description: Learn how to use GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio to diagnose and fix performance issues in unfamiliar code. This session walks through a real-world scenario to show how agentic use of Copilot can speed up analysis, and improve developer flow.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: AI Tools for Infrastructure Management
sessions.description: Explore how to use Azure Copilot and agentic AI to manage cloud infrastructure. We’ll break down its architecture, orchestration logic, VS Code integration, and how it uses LLMs to detect issues and automate remediation before they escalate.

sessions.title: Efficient model customization with Azure AI Foundry
sessions.description: Learn how to customize AI models and optimize their performance for your scenario through targeted fine-tuning methods. This session discusses Distillation, RFT and RAFT approaches using Azure AI Foundry, and shows how you can reduce costs and improve precision with less data and complexity.
sessions.topic: Innovate with Azure AI apps and agents

sessions.title: Secure, Govern, and Scale Your AI Agents with Azure API Management
sessions.description: Learn how to protect agents from prompt injection, manage API access, monitor usage, and control costs using Azure API Management. This session covers practical steps for deploying agent-based systems securely and at scale, with real-time observability and governance.

sessions.title: Transforming Sales & Service with Agentic Customer Experience
sessions.description: Explore how Microsoft 365 Copilot and Dynamics 365 delivers agentic customer experience (CX), helping organizations drive higher revenue and CSAT. See live demos of the latest innovations and hear about Microsoft's AI vision to transform revenue generating functions.

sessions.title: AI Skills Trivia Extravaganza with Microsoft Learn
sessions.description: Looking to test your AI skills? Join us to check your knowledge on AI, have fun, and stand a chance to win exciting prizes from our amazing guest hosts. Enhance your AI skills and enjoy a lively, interactive session with fellow enthusiasts.
